Using Kallisto to index genome:

Required argument:
-i, --index=STRING
Add a filename for the kallisto index to be constructed.

```{bash, eval = FALSE}
kallisto index -i TRCI.index Trucit1_1_AssemblyScaffolds.fasta
```
